function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on infection control in certain facility types","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks in specific facility types","Mitigation":"Conduct targeted studies and implement specific infection control measures in underrepresented facility types","Technologies":"HVAC and air filtration systems, sanitation and disinfection technologies","People":"Residents, staff, and visitors of underrepresented facility types","Owner":"Research institutions, facility management teams, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Limited coverage of specific pathogens in FM interventions","Impact":"Incomplete understanding and mitigation of disease transmission risks","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive studies on a wider range of pathogens, prioritize emerging diseases, and implement tailored infection control measures","Technologies":"Pathogen detection technologies, rapid testing methods, advanced sanitation technologies","People":"People in facilities at risk of pathogen transmission","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, facility management teams"},{"Description":"Lack of focus on integrated FM interventions","Impact":"Missed opportunities to address complex infection control challenges","Mitigation":"Conduct interdisciplinary research to develop integrated FM strategies, prioritize interventions with holistic impact on infection control","Technologies":"Building automation systems, IoT for facility monitoring, data analytics for infection control","People":"Facility managers, public health experts, research institutions","Owner":"Facility management teams, public health organizations, research institutions"}]}
